reviews.text: A short specification - ASTERA Hotel is situated in Golden Sands Resort close to the sea (ab. 20 km far from Varna, 50 m from the beach) and not in Varna. We’ve stayed in Astera Hotel two times in extra season but believe me all services (spa center, fitness, and pool, casino, etc.) were functional. Nice people and good food.
reviews.title: Excelent Services

likes.liked: — Large Double Room (No Apartments in the Hotel) Large Balcony
